result.eng: The article was written by the president.
result.ga: An t-uachtarán a scríobh an t-alt
result.orig: An t-uachtarán a scríobh an t-alt
result.html: An t-uachtarán a scríobh an t-altThe article was written by the president.
result.ponchtml: An t-uaċtarán a scríoḃ an t-altThe article was written by the president.

result.eng: Would you like to write an article?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat alt a scríobh
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat alt a scríobh
result.html: Ar mhaith leat alt a scríobhWould you like to write an article?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat alt a scríoḃWould you like to write an article?

result.eng: Number of words in the article.
result.html: Líon na bhfocal san altNumber of words in the article.
result.ponchtml: Líon na ḃfocal san altNumber of words in the article.

result.eng: Don't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ga: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.orig: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.html: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ponchtml: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roiṁ an ainmḟocal sa ċás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.

result.eng: The article comes with a glossary.
result.ga: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an alt
result.orig: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an alt
result.html: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an altThe article comes with a glossary.
result.ponchtml: Tá gluais ag gaḃáil leis an altThe article comes with a glossary.

result.eng: An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.
result.html: Tabharfar liúntas de bhua Alt 279An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfar liúntas de ḃua Alt 279An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.
